rukus.text: Ve yevme neb’asu min kulli ummetin sehiden summe la yu’zenu lillezinekeferu ve la hum yusta’tebun(yusta’tebune)
Ve iza raellezine zalemul azabe fe la yuhaffefuanhum ve la hum yunzarun(yunzarune)
Ve iza raellezine esreku surekaehum kalu rabbena haulai surekaunellezine kunna ned’u min dunik(dunike), fe elkav ileyhimul kavle innekum le kazibun(kazibune)
Ve elkav ilallahi yevme izinis seleme ve dalle anhum ma kanu yefterun(yefterune)
Ellezine keferu ve saddu an sebilillahi zidnahum azaben fevkal azabi bima kanu yufsidun(yufsidune)

Ve yevme neb’asu fi kulli ummetin sehiden aleyhim min enfusihim ve ci’nabike sehiden ala haula(haulai), ve nezzelna aleykel kitabe tibyanen likulli sey’in ve huden ve rahmeten ve busra lil muslimin(muslimine)
